resource.profileNotFound: The specified profile was not found.
resource.noFilesFound: No files to save were found.

permission.writeDenied: No write permission for the file.

filesystem.fileLocked: File is locked by another process.

operation.deleteFailed: An error occurred while deleting the set.

config.profileExists: A profile with the same name already exists.

ui.fileSelectionError: An error occurred during file selection.

permissionDenied: Check the permissions of the file or directory
Try running with sudo (for system directories)
diskFull: Change the save location to another disk
fileLocked: Close other programs using the file
Wait a moment and try again
setNotFound: Use 'claudy list' command to check available sets
